LeakGuard Braid helps stop leaks before they happen

body.description: It's a new time for that time of the month. Get up to 100% leak and odor-free protection with Tampax Radiant tampons designed with a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they even happen. For protection you can feel good about. Got leaks? Go up an absorbency. Uncomfortable to remove? Go down an absorbency. Free of dyes, perfume, latex*, BPA, and elemental chlorine bleaching. Thanks to their Textured Grip, they are specifically designed for incredibly comfortable tampon insertion. Plus, they come in a CleanSeal Wrapper created for more** ease, more clean, and more hygiene - to help dispose of them wherever you are. How to insert a tampon: Slowly insert the tampon applicator from the tip, all the way to the grip. After you've pushed the plunger in all the way, pull the applicator out. How to remove a tampon: You'll use your thumb and finger to grip the string and pull it slowly out. Please do not flush your tampon. Properly dispose of your tampon in the trash.Don't settle for less when you can get more. Discover outstanding protection for up to eight hours with Tampax, the #1 U.S. Gynecologist recommended tampon brand*** *natural rubber latex **vs. Tampax Pearl ***based on 2020 survey

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and absorbent
reviews.reviewText: Tampax Radiant Tampons, in their Regular Absorbency variant with LeakGuard Braid, have not only streamlined the often-dreaded task of tampon insertion but have also proven to be a shining star in the realm of absorbency.The standout feature of these tampons is undoubtedly the seamless insertion process. The smooth, rounded tip glides effortlessly, making it incredibly user-friendly. The compact size and discreet packaging add to the overall convenience, making them an ideal choice for those on the go. If you've ever experienced discomfort or hesitation during insertion, Tampax Radiant Tampons might just be the game-changer you've been searching for.Beyond the ease of use, the absorbency level of these tampons is commendable. The Regular Absorbency variant strikes a perfect balance, providing reliable protection without feeling overly bulky. The LeakGuard Braid adds an extra layer of security, offering peace of mind throughout your day, whether you're tackling work, hitting the gym, or simply going about your routine.The radiant design, with its discreet and aesthetically pleasing packaging, is an added bonus that sets Tampax Radiant apart from other tampons on the market. The plastic applicator is not only environmentally conscious but also ensures a smooth and comfortable insertion every time.One of the most significant strengths of these tampons is their ability to keep you comfortable and confident without compromising on performance. They effectively tackle the challenges of menstruation with a design that reflects both thoughtful engineering and a commitment to user well-being.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are the only ones I will use anymore
reviews.reviewText: Tampax radiant is far superior to any other product out there, including other Tampax versions. The applicator is easy to use. The string is substantial and has some absorbency in emergency situations. The actual tampon expands and absorbs very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Another applicator and good absorption
reviews.reviewText: I don't know who wants to read a tampon review but here ya go. These are awesome as far as tampons go. Applicator is comfortable to use (which is honestly one of the MOST important details, am I right?) and functions correctly. Material absorbs decently. It's nice to get this quantity conveniently delivered on the regular so I don't worry about running out, and I'm sure it would be helpful to any embarrassed by shopping for these in person too. My only complaint is on one of my shipments once, every tampon wrapper was sealed shut and would not open at the flap as they should, so weird. That entire group of boxes I had to tear down the side of eCh tampin wrapper instead. But usually they open very conveniently so I'm not holding one shipment against them more than one star off. I'm still happy with the product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023

reviews.reviewText: My daughter is mortified if I say ok let’s go get some at the store. So I found these here and perfect. I don’t have to go out for them and the price is the same as in stores.
